section.title: Print Return Authorization Form
section.para: To print a Return Authorization, select the "Print Return Authorization Form" option. The following screen will appear:
When printing or reprinting a Return Authorization, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Return Authorization you want to print.
Select the report definition you want to use for the form.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without printing a Return Authorization, returning you to the application desktop.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
